channel.title: 317 - 377 Cache dumper
channel.description:
Made a program that dumps the whole old engine cache. Thought I would share, so here you go.
[b]What this program does:[/b] -Dumps archive stuff like the NPC and item data. -Dumps all the models, maps, graphics, animations and sounds. -Automatically creates the dumping directories if they don't exist.
[b]What this program doens't do:[/b] -It doesn't read the image files from the media archive.
[b]Pictures[/b] [img]http://s16.postimage.org/5ykubn9ud/Screenshot_at_2012_01_23_20_48_13.png[/img] [img]http://s16.postimage.org/g9x74b1jp/Screenshot_at_2012_01_23_20_51_52.png[/img]
[b]Old version:[/b] Source+Cache+Dump: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?az7zvw9yiiac9cw]CacheDumper_V4.tar.gz[/url] Source without cache and dump. So you can paste the cache in it yourself: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?jwkojlodfzx3eqj]CacheDumper_V4_NoCache.tar.gz[/url]
[b]New version.[/b] Decompresses the model, map, animation and sound files. [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?bcipksm5dd5fujb]CacheDumper_V4.1_Updated[/url]
[b]Credits:[/b] Me. Jagex

item.title: 317 - 377 Cache dumper
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

@The Wanderer
Tried.

My output said it couldn’t find “pk_headicons”.
You should replace the MEDIA_DATA_NAMES array with this.

	/**
	 * The names of the data in the media archive.
	 */
	private static final String[] MEDIA_DATA_NAMES = { "invback.dat",
			"chatback.dat", "mapback.dat", "backbase1.dat", "backbase2.dat",
			"backhmid1.dat", "compass.dat", "mapedge.dat", "backleft1.dat",
			"backleft2.dat", "backright1.dat", "backright2.dat",
			"backtop1.dat", "backvmid1.dat", "backvmid2.dat", "backvmid3.dat",
			"backhmid2.dat", "mapmarker.dat", "cross.dat", "mapdots.dat",
			"scrollbar.dat", "redstone1.dat", "redstone2.dat", "redstone3.dat",
			"mod_icons.dat", "sideicons.dat", "mapscene.dat",
			"mapfunction.dat", "hitmarks.dat", "index.dat" };

Oh, and by the way. If you would like the program to automatically decompress the files. I updated the program.
http://www.mediafire.com/?bcipksm5dd5fujb

Read full topic

item.title: 317 - 377 Cache dumper
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

You didn’t try 319 either, then. I got errorzzz.

Initialized the data cache file. Initialized the index cache files. Reading archive: 1 Reading archive: 2 Reading archive: 3 Reading archive: 4 Reading archive: 5 Reading archive: 6 Reading archive: 7 Reading archive: 8 Reading archive: 1 Default case invoked for: opcode = 141, "LoopLimit" 1: Dumped file: title.jag Reading archive: 2 2: Dumped file: config.jag Reading archive: 3 3: Dumped file: interface.jag Reading archive: 4 4: Dumped file: media.jag Reading archive: 5 5: Dumped file: versionlist.jag Reading archive: 6 6: Dumped file: textures.jag Reading archive: 7 7: Dumped file: wordenc.jag Reading archive: 8 8: Dumped file: sounds.jag 9: Dumped file: 24: Dumped file: npc.idx 25: Dumped file: obj.dat 26: Dumped file: obj.idx 27: Dumped file: seq.dat 28: Dumped file: spotanim.dat 29: Dumped file: varbit.dat 30: Dumped file: varp.dat 31: Dumped file: data 32: Dumped file: invback.dat 33: Dumped file: chatback.dat 34: Dumped file: mapback.dat 35: Dumped file: backbase1.dat 36: Dumped file: backbase2.dat 37: Dumped file: backhmid1.dat 38: Dumped file: compass.dat 39: Dumped file: mapedge.dat 40: Dumped file: backleft1.dat 41: Dumped file: backleft2.dat 42: Dumped file: backright1.dat 43: Dumped file: backright2.dat 44: Dumped file: backtop1.dat 45: Dumped file: backvmid1.dat 46: Dumped file: backvmid2.dat 47: Dumped file: backvmid3.dat 48: Dumped file: backhmid2.dat 49: Dumped file: mapmarker.dat 50: Dumped file: cross.dat 51: Dumped file: mapdots.dat 52: Dumped file: scrollbar.dat 53: Dumped file: redstone1.dat 54: Dumped file: redstone2.dat 55: Dumped file: redstone3.dat 56: Dumped file: mod_icons.dat 57: Dumped file: sideicons.dat 58: Dumped file: mapscene.dat 59: Dumped file: mapfunction.dat 60: Dumped file: hitmarks.dat 61: Dumped file: index.dat Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at java.io.FilterOutputStream.write(Unknown Source) at com.simon.Main.dump(Main.java:172) at com.simon.Main.main(Main.java:336) Press any key to continue . . .
MediaFire

319 - Confirmed.rar

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.

There’s the cache to debug. Yet to do 369. I have 353/645 of the old midis lol.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 - 377 Cache dumper
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

b b0yz 4:

okay, I figured out how to put them into my client, but now some of the items that were working last time are messed up. Any ideas for a fix?

Nope, sorry.

b b0yz 4:

How do I put these into my client? Sorry for asking such a noob question. I just need help.

I have honestly no idea, probably the opposite way of how I dumped them. But, you should already have these files in your cache.

Edit: Updated thread.
Now it also dumps the archive files. (.jag)

Edit: Updated thread again.
Now it dumps the whole cache, which means the models, music, maps and animations.

Read full topic
